item.title: Hershey vs. Mondelez: Which Stock Wins Chocolate Season?
item.description: Cocoa inflation is squeezing candy makers, but Hershey’s diversification gives it an edge over Mondelez as holiday chocolate season heats up

item.title: Cintas Stock Sends a Clear Buy Signal as Momentum Builds
item.description: Cintas is on track to continue its trend and rise to set new highs, potentially in late 2025 but likely in 2026 as economic tailwinds begin to form.
